headline: Caterpillar Rides AI Data Center Boom With Priced In Expectations
summary: Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) is reporting record-high performance tied to its role in supplying equipment and power systems for AI data center infrastructure. The company is shifting its business mix toward Power & Energy as demand grows for data center support and related industrial equipment. Caterpillar is upgrading mining equipment and converting engines to run on natural gas to align with data center growth and sustainability priorities. Caterpillar has long been known for heavy machinery,...
